description:
Anodea Judith, PhD., is the founder and director of Sacred Centers, and a writer, therapist and spiritual teacher. She holds Masters and Doctoral degrees in Psychology and Human Health, and is considered one of the USA’s foremost experts on the combination of chakras and therapeutic issues. Her other bestselling titles include Chakra Yoga, Chakras: Wheels
of Life and Chakras: The Pathways to Success.
name: Anodea Judith
